title: Esther McVey
summary: Esther Louise McVey (born 24 October 1967) is a British politician serving as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Tatton since 2017. A member of the Conservative Party, she served in the Cabinet as Minister of State for Housing and Planning from 2019 to 2020, Secretary of State for Work and Pensions in 2018 and Minister of State for Employment from 2014 to 2015.
